question: What is the closest planet to the sun? \n1. Mercury 2. Venus 3. Earth 4. Mars
What is the largest planet in our solar system?\n1. Jupiter 2. Saturn 3. Uranus 4. Neptune
What is the farthest planet from the sun?\n1. Jupiter 2. Saturn 3. Uranus 4. Neptune
hint: Also the name of a roman god.

question: What is the smallest planet in our solar system?\n1. Mercury 2. Venus 3. Earth 4. Mars
hint: Also the name of an element.

question: What is the hottest planet in our solar system?\n1. Mercury 2. Venus 3. Earth 4. Mars
hint: Sometimes called Earth's twin due to its size and composition.

question: What is the coldest planet in our solar system?\n1. Jupiter 2. Saturn 3. Uranus 4. Neptune
hint: Also the name of a body part.
